Constant Field Values

TRANSACTION_SUPPORT_KEY

public static final String TRANSACTION_SUPPORT_KEY
Key for use with DomainConfig.createConnectorConnectionPoolConfig(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.util.Map), value must be java.lang.String. Indicates the level of transaction support that this pool will have. Possible values are as defined in TransactionSupportValues. This attribute will override that transaction support attribute in the Resource Adapter in a downward compatible way, i.e it can support a lower/equal transaction level than specified in the RA, but not a higher level.

See Also:
ConnectorConnectionPoolConfig.setTransactionSupport(java.lang.String), Constant Field Values
